resources.string:
Hi there, my name is Rui. 

 I am dedicated to become a Googler in the neat future. 

 I'm learning for the necessary knowledge to build my first Android App. 

 I got my first Bachelor's degree in Accounting where I developed my critical thinking skills and data sensitivity. During my Master's degree in Management Information Systems, I gradually converted my career path from business to technology. And now I've decided to pursue a second Bachelor's degree in Computer Science to further improve my technical skills while preparing to become a Googler.
